column13: The People was great... Under OneMain before Springleaf...  Had various projects that kept us busy.
column14: Springleaf bought OneMain and all changes  went towards the AS/400 system which is out dated.  Which OneMain was updated and URL application process which is faster and easier to read. Had various projects that kept us busy then Springleaf wanted to keep OneMain Application process and then decided that they did not want to change their system to work with our application process.  Laid off a lot of people (more from OneMain) than Springleaf side.
